I didnt  like to be sarcastic... hosnest. Garfiends comics are one 
of my favorites and this card brings me happy memories when 
my old bro was in home (Hes ok but far of us). 

Maybe I should know that was so nice that you remember all of 
the player of rpg in thas special day, I cant remember one 
ocation before that some had done something like that in the 
boards that I visit... although they have their ways to ceelebrate 
the holydays

Happy new year Megan!!!!
